Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: Companies that have been in the telecommunications business for more than 20 years. Seventeen years ago we were among the first to create a platform for intelligent communications services, including fixed-mobile convergence. This experienced project with a good plan is very convincing for success

Author: BubbleTone_Support
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: We chose a meaningful name: while the messenger is a full-featured working tool for users, it's as easy to use as blowing bubbles.  We believe that this fun brand name will make our messenger more recognizable around the world.

Author: BubbleTone_Support
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: We’re a reliable team with 20 years’ experience in telecom industry. During this period, we have created multiple telecom and software development businesses.  Please see examples below.  - Mobile Virtual Network Operator under brand “Allo Incognito” (240K Premium Subscribers).  - BubbleTone messenger with 100+ useful features. It’s customized for the needs of mobile operators to provide additional revenue streams on voice calls and SMS from the app and other telecom services. Beta version is already available at App Store and Google Play.       - Global Mobile Data Exchange platform developed for mobile operators who are interested in global coverage services for their subscribers. Local prices for mobile services are already available in 80+ countries.  - OTA platform we are using for remote downloading of mobile profiles via service SMS was developed by MDS company owned by us.  - Whole Yandex Telephony project (connecting 15 Russian cities) operates on infrastructure developed by us. The project is managed by SanSim company which is our subsidiary.

Author: koloNikolo
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: Can you describe the process of joining to Bubbletone? I travel a lot and I want to know how it will work.

Author: BubbleTone_Support
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: Thank you for the question!  Anyone will be able to enjoy roaming free mobile and data services with BubbleTone, all what's needed is to find a home mobile operator who has already joined BubbleTone and purchase his SIM card (special SIM allowing for remote mobile profile downloading). After that you will be able to choose and purchase offers from foreign operators with BubbleTone and enjoy mobile connection and data at local rates in any part of the globe. Any modern smartphone can be used.

Author: BubbleTone_Support
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: http://bubbletone.io  WEBSITE | TELEGRAM | FACEBOOK | YOUTUBE | TWITTER | MEDIUM  !BOUNTY IS LIVE!  BubbleTone Blockchain in Telecom - the first decentralized telecom ecosystem. It allows mobile network operators, phone users and service providers to interact directly.  >>>  WHITE PAPER | ONE PAGER | YELLOW PAPER  <<<  BubbleTone Blockchain in Telecom is for:   Project Vision   We directly connect mobile network operators and end users globally on our blockchain-based marketplace. As a mobile operator in Europe with over 20 years in telecom, we are going to leverage this blockchain platform to enter the global market and offer it to all operators.   Problem International roaming now means prohibitive expenses both for telecoms and subscribers around the world. Inter-operator charges for entering roaming market now exceed $20 million. Traditional roaming market is huge, but failing: according to research, 71% of all roamers globally remained silent, with just 1% of subscribers consuming 80% of all traffic in roaming.  SOLUTION With BubbleTone Blockchain, travelers can swiftly become legitimate local customers of any foreign operator in the country they are traveling to. They won’t have to replace their SIM card, and they retain their home number.   Any mobile carrier can publish prepaid plans as smart contracts on BubbleTone Blockchain. These offers are visible to all other operators and their subscribers. When subscriber selects offer, a new smart contract is created with the subscriber’s digital identity and payment transaction directly to foreign operator.  Our market   Every interaction between users, operators and service providers creates new smart contract in BubbleTone ecosystem. The potencial is over 1 000 000 000 smart contracts by 2020.  BubbleTone Mobile App  To make this process easy and comfortable for everyone, we created the BubbleTone Mobile App.  Beta-version is already launched available on iTunes and Google Play.  ●   Marketplace connecting subscribers and local network operators globally ●   Messaging and lifestyle app customizable for operators’ needs and content delivery  UMT Token     >>>  OUR SMART CONTRACTS ON GITHUB<<<  Our Team       >>>  READ OUR WHITEPAPER  <<<  >>>  READ OUR ONE PAGER  <<<  JOIN OUR 24/7 TELEGRAM CHAT   Partners   Contacts  WEBSITE | TELEGRAM | FACEBOOK | YOUTUBE | TWITTER | GITHUB| MEDIUM

Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: They write in the white paper "Blockchain in Telecom" that the ecosystem provides direct interaction between end users, mobile operators communications and service providers through smart contracts. Is this a new global provider?

Author: BubbleTone_Support
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: The goal of the Bubbletone Blockchain platform is to eliminate long, complex and costly procedures and create a new market for thousands of telecom carriers and open affordable mobile services for silent roamers.  BubbleTone Blockchain in Telecom ecosystem provides direct interaction between end-users, mobile operators and service-providers via smart contracts.                 It eliminates hundreds of intermediators, dramatically reduces costs of mobile services for end users (up to 10 times while going abroad), and saves years and millions of $$ on implementation of the old- fashioned and ineffective roaming technology. Moreover, the platform creates a synergy between the telecom business and service providers outside of the telecom market. With Bubbletone there is no need for a global provider as you will be able to become a customer of a local provider in a few seconds.

Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom

Author: BubbleTone_Support
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: BubbleTone is not a global mobile service provider, BubbleTone is a global ecosystem for telecom service providers. They can join the system and leverage the advantage of direct interaction with clients and other operators with their businesses.

Author: krymson
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: Interesting project with a promising goal and a team with good experience.  I've selected you guys as ICO of the Day.

Author: BubbleTone_Support
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: Mobile operators will benefit due to quick growth of provided services amount. We actively interacting with major mobile operators in several countries. Operators do not earn top dollar on roaming. High prices are related to high costs for roaming technology deployment and maintenance as well as high intermediator fees. The fact is that high roaming prices  reduce the volume of communication services’ consumption. People use mobile less when in roaming just to save money.  The lower communication services cost for the user, the more he uses it. Thus, BubbleTone will help operators to sell more traffic.  BubbleTone system users will get communication services at local rates anywhere in the world + they will be able to stay connected with their home number linked to BubbleTone messenger. BubbleTone messenger is a competitive modern app with all standard functions + it offers users a number of unique blockchain features not available with other messengers (blockchain voting, crypto and fiat transfers etc.).

Author: Fu.Sin
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: Do not quite understand the interaction between mobile operators and your project? Each mobile operator has its own development staff capable of developing any system.

Author: BubbleTone_Support
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: Step 1: Any mobile carrier can publish its own prepaid tariff plans (“Offers”) as smart contracts. These Offers are visible to all other operators and their subscribers. Step 2: A subscriber requests his home operator for service abroad. Step3: The home operator sends smart-contract (“Request”) with Digital Identity hash and Financial Transaction to the blockchain. Step 4: The smart-contract can be executed now. The money and the visitor’s identity are sent. Step 5: Visited operator services the subscriber directly by downloading his own mobile profile into visiting user’s SIM-card through OTA platform in seconds. Please let me know if you have any further questions. Thank you!

Author: Polina Rusyaeva
Title: [ANN][ICO] Bubbletone Blockchain in Telecom
Body: Hello, everyone on the thread!  A very promising idea, professional team, responsive support - the project is a masterpiece. So underadvertised it may not even reach hard cap in my opinion, but it will blow the market anyways.  I'm on board already. Good luck team Bubbletone!
